Which is lightly slice open

might not sound peaceful,

and stabbing I've seen with 
most other place in the planet,
the sheep died in five seconds.

Didn't bleet, didn't make

But now, like every 
single time this happens,
the entire sheep will be used.

The insides, the outsides,

or an item for the table,
or you never really know.

Every culture, every 
tradition has its own way
of using the animal pieces.

And they respect it, 
every single bit of it.

Even if it's we throw 
away in North America
and the western world.

I think if an animal gonna
